DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to investigate the patient experience during skin biopsy.
DOC.criteria: Age 18 and Over The subjects are in good health. The subjects have the willingness and the ability to understand and provide informed consent for the use of their tissue and communicate with the investigator. Patients who have had one or multiple skin biopsies OR boardcertified dermatologists. Under 18 years of age. Subjects who are unable to understand the protocol or give informed consent.
